name: Potion Shop (The Cool Bounana)
description:
A game about making potions, and selling them to customers! 

(btw) This game isn't close to finish, I actually just wanted to get over it and upload it so that I could move on to my next idea. If a lot of people like it (which probably won't happen tbh) I'll like update it or something (like add music and stuff). (its basically a prototype ig, oh yeah and theres... a decent amount of 🐞)
